definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Such technology, however, remains firmly in the realm of science fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 然而這樣的技術頑固地停留在科學幻想的範疇。

sentences.english: He's a great reader of science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 他很喜歡看科學幻想小說。

sentences.english: Science fantasy is informed by science fiction and driven by hubris.
sentences.chinese: 科學幻想來自科幻小說並且被狂妄所趨使。
